Text:
thank you so much; I have been looking forward to this.

by the way, will you also be upping the Lifetime movies?
I try to record Lifetime Movies, but sometimes forget, but will do that when given the chance.

TVRip needs a little work to improve where the station breaks are taken out to get rid of the awful green screen flashes. Other than that no problem.

Thanks....
Hi RayCort, Can you upload "how to fall in love"?  Many Thanks for all your uploads!

Good to see "RayCort" again, have missed him since Demonoid closed down.

Always good TV-Rips from you. :)
